name: clipping-online.com v.5
description: Web app for managing orders for online graphic design company. Features include: For the USER: register, login, restart forgotne password, adding orders, uploading files to the server, sharing download links, receiving emails, paying online. FOR THE ADMIN: accesing cPanel, managing orders, sending emails with order apprisal, downloading orders, uploading packages with finished work, receiving messages via live chat.
author: Filip Wojtaszek
